Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Human Rights Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select D.*, CP12.DESIGNATION, CP12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT_COUNT, CASE WHEN D.HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN D.HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT_DIM, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_DIM, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP12UNHRTREATY_BODY D, CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE CP12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE CP12.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP12.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP12.ID = D.PARENT_ID AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP12.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 AND CP12.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP12.ENTITY_YEAR

select D.*, CP12.DESIGNATION, CP12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.UNCT_SUPPORTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UNCT_SUPPORTED_COUNT, CASE WHEN D.UNCT_SUPPORTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN D.UNCT_SUPPORTED = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as UNCT_SUPPORTED, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_DIM, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP12VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC D, CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE CP12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE CP12.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP12.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP12.ID = D.PARENT_ID AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP12.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 AND CP12.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP12.ENTITY_YEAR

select cp12.ID, cp12.DESIGNATION, cp12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR, CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH, CASE WHEN cp12training.PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12training.PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12training.PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS, CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUPRPROCESS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUPRPROCESS, CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED, CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC, CASE WHEN cp12.HASHRI = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASHRI_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASHRI = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp12.HASHRI = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HASHRI, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from -- DERBY-PROPERTIES joinOrder = FIXED CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE cp12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, CP12TRAINING_ONHRAPPROACH cp12training, CP12HRANALYSIS cp12hranalysis, CP12UPRPROCESS cp12uprprocess, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE cp12.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp12.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp12training.PARENT_ID = cp12.id AND cp12hranalysis.PARENT_ID = cp12.id AND cp12uprprocess.PARENT_ID = cp12.id AND cp12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp12.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and cp12.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp12.ENTITY_YEAR

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Human Rights Measures

Dimension.caption: Year

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Special Procedure of HRC

Measure.caption: Count of UNCT support this visit

ForeignKeyLink.dimension: Has UNCT support this visit
Has UNCT facilitate recommendations by the Gov

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: UNCT Human Rights Advisor
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a designated person or group to advise it on human rights matters?

Dimension.name: Human Rights-Based Approach
Dimension.caption: Has a training on Human Rights-Based Approach been conducted in the current programme cycle?

Dimension.name: Was it undertaken as part of the UNDAF rollout process
Dimension.caption: Was it undertaken as part of the UNDAF rollout process?

Dimension.name: Human rights analysis
Dimension.caption: Has a human rights analysis taken place over the past year?

Dimension.name: HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR
Dimension.caption: Has a strategy been developed to address the human rights issues identified in the analysis?

Dimension.name: Has action been taken to address the human rights issues identified in the human rights analysis
Dimension.caption: Has action been taken to address the human rights issues identified in the human rights analysis?

Dimension.name: UNCT supported
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the government in mainstreaming human rights into national development policies and programmes?

Dimension.name: UPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT engaged in the preparation, reporting or follow-up of the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) this year?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT submitted a UNCT report to the UPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT submitted a UNCT report to the UPR?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the UPR recommendations by the Government
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the UPR recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and/or advocacy strategies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and/or advocacy strategies?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported the government to develop a report for the UPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the government to develop a report for the UPR?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for the UPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for the UPR?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported the National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for the UPR
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for the UPR?

Dimension.name: UN human rights treaty bodies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT engaged with one or more UN human rights treaty bodies in the past year (preparation, review, or follow-up)?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the human rights treaty body recommendations by the Government
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the human rights treaty body recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT drawn on the human rights treaty body recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT drawn on the human rights treaty body recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT submitted inputs/reports to human rights treaty bodies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT submitted inputs/reports to human rights treaty bodies?

Dimension.name: Was the country reviewed by a treaty body this year
Dimension.caption: Was the country reviewed by a treaty body this year?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations of the Special Procedures to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations of the Special Procedures to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?

Dimension.name: Receive a visit of a Special Procedure
Dimension.caption: Did the country receive a visit of a Special Procedure (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) of the Human Rights Council in the last year?

Dimension.name: Did the UNCT facilitate follow up of the recommendations by the Government
Dimension.caption: Did the UNCT facilitate follow up of the recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: Did the UNCT engage with the government on facilitating visits by Special Procedures (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) this year (preparation, visit, follow-up)
Dimension.caption: Did the UNCT engage with the government on facilitating visits by Special Procedures (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) this year (preparation, visit, follow-up)?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported the government in preparing for the visits of Special Procedures
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported the government in preparing for the visits of Special Procedures?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported civil society interact with the Special Procedure
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported civil society interact with the Special Procedure?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution interact with the Special Procedures
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution interact with the Special Procedures?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT provided inputs to the visit of the Special Procedures
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT provided inputs to the visit of the Special Procedures?

Dimension.name: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the Special Procedures recommendations by the Government
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the Special Procedures recommendations by the Government?

Dimension.name: NHRI
Dimension.caption: Is there a National Human Rights Institution (NHRI) in the country?

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Country Records Submitted

Measure.name: UNCTHumanRightsAdvisor
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT Human Rights Advisor

Measure.name: HumanRightsBasedApproach
Measure.caption: Count of training on Human Rights-Based Approach been conducted in the current programme cycle

Measure.name: partOfRolloutProcess
Measure.caption: Count of 'Was it undertaken as part of the UNDAF rollout process?'

Measure.name: HumanRightsAnalysis
Measure.caption: Count of human rights analysis taken place over the past year

Measure.name: HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has a strategy been developed to address the human rights issues identified in the analysis?'

Measure.name: hasAddressedHRIssues
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has action been taken to address the human rights issues identified in the human rights analysis?'

Measure.name: UNCTSupported
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT supported the government in mainstreaming human rights into national development policies and programmes

Measure.name: UPR
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT engaged with the Universal Periodic Review (UPR) process this year

Measure.name: hasUNCTReportUPRSubmitted
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT submitted a UNCT report to the UPR?'

Measure.name: hasFacilitatedFolloupGovRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the UPR recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedGovernmentUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported the government to develop a report for the UPR?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedCivilSocietyUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for the UPR?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedNationalHumanRightsInstitutionUPR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported the National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for the UPR?'

Measure.name: UNHumanRightsTreatyBodies
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT engaged with one or more UN human rights treaty bodies in the past year

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedCivilSocietyDevelopInputs
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported civil society develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedNationalHumaRightsInstitution
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution develop inputs or reports for human rights treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSubmittedInputsReports
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT submitted inputs/reports to human rights treaty bodies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitatedFollowUpRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the human rights treaty body recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSDrawnOnRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT drawn on the human rights treaty body recommendations to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?'

Measure.name: wasCountryReviewedByTreatyBody
Measure.caption: Count of 'Was the country reviewed by a treaty body this year?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTRecommendations
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT drawn on the recommendations of the Special Procedures to inform UN analysis, programming and advocacy strategies?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitateFollowUpGovernment
Measure.caption: Count of 'Did the UNCT facilitate follow up of the recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: ReceiveVisitSpecialProcedure
Measure.caption: Count of country receive a visit of a Special Procedure (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) of the Human Rights Council in the last year

Measure.name: hasUNCTEngageWithGovernmen
Measure.caption: Count of 'Did the UNCT engage with the government on facilitating visits by Special Procedures (Special Rapporteur, Independent Expert or Working Group) this year (preparation, visit, follow-up)?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedGovernmentSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported the government in preparing for the visits of Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTSupportedCivilSocietySpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported civil society interact with the Special Procedure?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTDSupportedNationalHumanRightsInstitution
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution interact with the Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTProvidedInputsSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT provided inputs to the visit of the Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitatedGollowUpSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the Special Procedures recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: NHRI
